content: I'm trying to #print out the full term generated by a tactic-mode proof but it seems that there is a limit on the depth, as in subterms beyond that depth simply get replaced with â€¦. Is there a way to prevent this from happening, e.g. by setting an option which increases the max depth? I've briefly skimmed through Chapter 6.9 in TPIL but could not seem to find such an option there.
OK, I think I just found it
